Record Class BattleRoyale

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Record
dev.royalcore.api.br.BattleRoyale
Record Components:
id - the unique identifier of this Battle Royale definition
scenarios - the list of scenarios that belong to this Battle Royale
settingsConsumer - the settings associated with this Battle Royale
onStart - the callback to invoke when the Battle Royale is started
onStop - the callback to invoke when the Battle Royale is stopped
state - the current state of the Battle Royale
resourcepackConsumer - the resource packs associated with the Battle Royale
structureConsumer - the structures associated with the Battle Royale
public record BattleRoyale(UUID id, List<Scenario> scenarios, SettingsConsumer settingsConsumer, Runnable onStart, Runnable onStop, BattleRoyaleState state, ResourcePackConsumer resourcepackConsumer, StructureConsumer structureConsumer) extends Record
Represents a single Battle Royale game definition, including its unique ID, scenarios, settings, lifecycle callbacks and current state.

  • Nested Class Summary

    Nested Classes
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    static class 
    BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder
    Builder for BattleRoyale instances, providing a fluent API to configure scenarios, settings, and lifecycle callbacks.

    Creates a new BattleRoyale instance and registers it in the legacy BattleRoyaleEngine.

  • Constructor Details

    • BattleRoyale

      public BattleRoyale(UUID id, List<Scenario> scenarios, SettingsConsumer settingsConsumer, Runnable onStart, Runnable onStop, BattleRoyaleState state, ResourcePackConsumer resourcepackConsumer, StructureConsumer structureConsumer)
      Creates a new BattleRoyale instance and registers it in the legacy BattleRoyaleEngine.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of this Battle Royale definition
      scenarios - the list of scenarios that belong to this Battle Royale
      settingsConsumer - the settings associated with this Battle Royale
      onStart - the callback to invoke when the Battle Royale is started
      onStop - the callback to invoke when the Battle Royale is stopped
      state - the initial state of the Battle Royale
      resourcepackConsumer - the resource packs used for this Battle Royale

  • Method Details

    • battleroyale

      public static BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder battleroyale(UUID uuid)
      Creates a new BattleRoyale.BattleRoyaleBuilder for the given ID.
      Parameters:
      uuid - the unique ID to use for the new Battle Royale
      Returns:
      a builder instance configured with the given ID

    • start

      public void start()
      Starts this Battle Royale by scheduling its onStart callback on the main thread.

    • stop

      public void stop()
      Stops this Battle Royale by scheduling its onStop callback on the main thread.

    • onStart

      @UnstableOnServerStart public void onStart(Consumer<Runnable> onStart)
      Exposes the configured onStart callback to external consumers.
      Parameters:
      onStart - a consumer that receives the current onStart runnable

    • equals

      public final boolean equals(Object o)
      Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one. The objects are equal if the other object is of the same class and if all the record components are equal. All components in this record class are compared with Objects::equals(Object,Object).
      Specified by:
      equals in class Record
      Parameters:

      Returns:
